{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Mercury |model=MW305R |revision=v3.x |asin= |est_release_date=07/2013 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=TP-LINK |manuf_model=TL-WR842N |manuf_rev=v4 |availability=China only |type=wireless router |fcc_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9531;QCA9531-AL3A; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=cFeon |fla1_model=EN25F80-100HCP |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3S64D40GTP-50 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, J3 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9531;QCA9531-AL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|N300 Wireless Router}}
"2050500363" is silkscreened on the [http://www.right.com.cn/forum/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=127693&aid=76558&from=album&page=1&mobile=2 board].
*[http://www.right.com.cn/forum/thread-127693-1-1.html On the '''right.com.cn''' forums] :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 (QCA9531-AL3A) :Flash: ''cFeon'' EN25F80 (1MB SPI) :RAM: ''Zentel'' A3S64D40GTP-50 (8MB)
* [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr842nd On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :[[TP-LINK TL-WR842N v4.x]] (v4.4) • [http://m.tp-link.com.cn/product_298.html PPage] :[[TP-LINK TL-WR842N v3.x]] (v3.0) • [http://forum.tp-linkru.ru/viewtopic.php?t=8327 On '''tp-link.ru''' forums] :*CPU: [[Atheros]] AR9341-DL3A :*Flash: ''cFeon'' EN25QH16-104HIP (127V1107) 2MB :*RAM: ''ESMT'' M13S128168A-5T (AZN2P3AU 1303) 16MB
